description: Allows the user to enable Bluetooth or restrict access. Note  This value is not supported in Windows Phone 8. 1 MDM and EAS, Windows 10 for desktop, or Windows 10 Mobile. If this is not set or it is deleted, the default value of 2 (Allow) is used. Most restricted value is 0.
name: AllowBluetooth

options.description: Disallow Bluetooth. If this is set to 0, the radio in the Bluetooth control panel will be grayed out and the user will not be able to turn Bluetooth on.

options.description: Reserved. If this is set to 1, the radio in the Bluetooth control panel will be functional and the user will be able to turn Bluetooth on.
